title: Is there any app which I can use to listen to news on my phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh wow… so many apps out there haha. Okay, here are my 5 recommendations. I own a news app, so I test competitors often so I know the good ones. I am going to assume, you want to be able to listen and read. Not all apps support listen only mode. SmartNews- read only, lots of great contentAudiBrow.com- Listen or Read, content from over 15 channelsApple News- read only. However, at this point limited to iOS devicesGood News- read only. Quick scan headlinesReuters- read and watch mode. Lots of global and local content.Hope this helps you. Enjoy. Tips: try not to overdo the news content. 15 mins is all you need in the morning to know what's going on. Tips: if you prefer to listen, use apps like AudiBrow to listen to news while you drive or at the gym.

Of course, there are many apps which you can use to listen to news. one of them is Khabri news app. It is one of the most informative and amazing news app which lets you know all type of local, global, Bollywood, cricket, rashifal, RRB news, etc. Khabri is one app that also provides you offline news in just one minute.
